titleStmt.title: Something concerning Agbarus, Prince of the Edesseans with his epistle to Christ, and Christ's epistle in answer thereto : also Paul's epistle to the Laodiceans, with the manner of his death and his exhortation to his persecutors : a catalogue of those Scriptures mentioned but not inserted in the Bible : as also how several Scriptures are corrupted by the translators, with the difference betwixt the old and new translations.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
